document_data.name: Stoengate House
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/Forging the Realms/The Eyes of the Dragon, Part 3}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Stonegate House''' was a rental villa in the city of [[Waterdeep]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: This villa fronted the western side of [[Snail Street]], nine doors north of where that road met [[Shesstra's Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] of the city.

Structure.Interior: The villa featured a dining area, a kitchen, a sitting room, bedchambers, bathing rooms, and areas for the storage of one's wardrobe.

document_data.Inhabitants: On the third floor of this villa, a suite of rooms were uneasily rented jointly by seven men who all aspired to be wealthy. These men all used the rooms at their exposal to conduct secret meetings as well as to entertain their various upscale contacts and clients.
